roleset.name: act as a host, with a partner

example.name: Both args
example.text: [Morton Downey Jr. , who self - destructed as a talk - show host and frequently verbally abused his guests ,]-1 has been signed [*-1]-2 [*-2] to co - host a half - hour nightly program on the Consumer News and Business Channel , the cable channel partly owned by the General Electric Co. 's National Broadcasting Co .

propbank.arg: a half - hour nightly program on the Consumer News and Business Channel , the cable channel partly owned by the General Electric Co. 's National Broadcasting Co

roleset.note: COHOST-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on newswire, 'host.01'. No VNcls. (from cohost.01-v)
